entry.title: Amanda Gelender-Social Impact & Open Source : How developers can drive change.
entry.summary:
Description

Open source technology is catalyzing social change across the globe. In this keynote session, Amanda Gelender, GitHub's Senior Manager of Social Impact, will discuss the importance of lowering barriers to entry in technology innovation. Youâ€™ll walk away with an understanding of how developers can utilize their skills by contributing to open source projects that are creating waves of powerful change in communities across the globe.
